entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Morris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
